explication: This is the mother tongue. The person has complete understanding and perfect fluency, capable of communicating effectively, with nuance, and effortlessly in any context, including professional and academic settings.

The individual can communicate in English for simple or routine work-related tasks. Understanding complex conversations or specialized terminology might be limited. This level usually means the person can handle basic job requirements but may struggle with deep technical discussions or formal writing.

The person has a fundamental level of understanding and expression. They can use basic phrases to satisfy concrete needs (greetings, simple questions, shopping, etc.), but communication is not fluent and is restricted to familiar topics.

Similar to Italian, this indicates an elementary knowledge of the language. The person can form simple sentences and understand frequent words and expressions, but cannot sustain complex or long conversations.
